For anyone interested, I found the build hiding in Cruise Control:

http://builds.archive.org:8080/cruisecontrol/artifacts/HEAD-heritrix/20080808001045/

On Wed, 2008-09-10 at 13:30 -0700, Matt Kent wrote:
> It seems that Heritrix 1.14.1 is the most recent release. The Javadoc
> claims it represents version 1.15.2, but I can find no evidence of said
> version in SVN or Jira. Does a tag of Heritrix 1.15.2 exist anywhere?
> I'm interested in the updates to the robots.txt stuff.
> 
> Matt
